directions: In a blender, combine all the ingredients. Add more ice if you want the smoothie thicker.
Serve in a highball glass or a pineapple cup.
Garnish with fresh sliced pineapple, banana slices and maraschino cherries.
ingredients: 1 cup of fresh pineapple juice (we actually blended up real slices of pineapple)
½ cup of Blue Curacao liqueur
¼ cup of cream of coconut
3+ cups of ice (depending on how thick you want it)
title: Umbrella Drink: Twisted Blue Hawaiian Smoothie
